vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Mahav(?), only mentioned at 1Ch.11.46
§ Mahavite = "propagators"
1) apparently, an inhabitant of a place called 'Macheweh'
1a) the designation of Eliel, one of David's mighty warriors
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪哈未人 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 "繁殖者"
大衛的大能勇士以利業 (代上 11:46)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛哈未人 这个形容词在原文的意思是 "繁殖者"
大卫的大能勇士以利业 (代上 11:46)
